1.title: Arianne
1.plot: Every woman in the world has experienced the highs and lows of the unpredictable and sometimes discouraging world of dating. Still looking for love? Have no fear, Love Hunters is here! Taking a look at today's diverse dating scene, Love Hunters takes you on an entertaining ride as a thirty-something who's single and ready to mingle, steps outside of her regular dating routine in an amusing attempt to find her prince charming. Each episode follows our "love hunter" as she is sent to sample three different approaches to dating including internet dating, speed dating and...

2.title: Jenny
2.plot: Love Hunter Jenny is facing the big 3-0. And this fun-loving, jet-setting teacher is starting to feel the pressure to settle down.

imdb.plot outline: Love Hunters is a reality dating series. Each episode features one single woman (the love hunter) who is hoping to find the perfect guy. On the show she will have three tries to find that Mr. Right.
imdb.title: Love Hunters
plot: _Love Hunters_ (qv) is a reality dating series. Each episode features one single woman (the love hunter) who is hoping to find the perfect guy. On the show she will have three tries to find that Mr. Right.::Anonymous

Every woman in the world has experienced the highs and lows of the unpredictable and sometimes discouraging world of dating. Still looking for love? Have no fear, _Love Hunters_ (qv) is here! Taking a look at today's diverse dating scene, _Love Hunters_ (qv) takes you on an entertaining ride as a thirty-something who's single and ready to mingle, steps outside of her regular dating routine in an amusing attempt to find her prince charming. Each episode follows our "love hunter" as she is sent to sample three different approaches to dating including internet dating, speed dating and the oldest trick in the book - being set-up. In a bid for a second date, three lucky guys try to woo our girl by planning the perfect romantic encounter. Who will win our love hunter's heart?::Anonymous
